it.zavo.maze.maze
Class Hole

java.lang.Object
  it.zavo.maze.maze.Hole

public class Hole
extends Object

Represents an hole of the maze.

Author:
Marco Mandrioli

Constructor Summary
Hole(float scale, float x, float y, float radius, boolean isGoal)
          Constructs an hole (or the goal) with a specified radius at the specified coordinates.

Constructor Detail

Hole

public Hole(float scale,
            float x,
            float y,
            float radius,
            boolean isGoal)
Constructs an hole (or the goal) with a specified radius at the specified coordinates.

Parameters:
scale - the size of the maze containing the ball.
x - the x coordinate of the center of the hole.
y - the x coordinate of the center of the hole.
radius - the radius of the hole.
isGoal - tells whether this is a common hole or the goal.
Method Detail

draw

public void draw(GL10 gl)
Draws the hole.

Parameters:
gl - the GL object.

getPosition

public float[] getPosition()
Returns the coordinates of the hole.

Returns:
an array of two floats (x, y).

getRadius

public float getRadius()
Returns the radius of the hole.

Returns:
the radius of the hole.

isGoal

public boolean isGoal()
Tells if the hole is the goal.

Returns:
true if the hole is the goal, false otherwise.
